title: Milan Multiplex font
content:
Hi there,  
I'm from France and i've got a problem to identify this font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621151850im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Milan_3781.jpg)
  
It was used to mark the Multiplex Glider Milan.  
I've tried to submit it to [http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621151850/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/ "http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/") but the problem stay unsolved.  
Does somebody have an idea ?  
Thanks in advance  
Best Regards  
Max
author: maxga

comments.content: It appears to be a heavily squooshed and tilted version of [Choc](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621151850/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letraset/choc/alternate_cuts.html).

Hi Birdseeding,  
Thanks a lot !  
Regards  
Max

When in France, first check Excoffon. :-)

hhp
